dict.acceptation: 意气相投，同感；同情，同情心；慰问；和谐的一致；

sent.orig: Please accept my deepest sympathy and convey my sympathy to his family.
sent.trans: 请接受我最深切的同情，并向他的家属转达我的慰问。

sent.orig: The sympathy between the twin brothers is so great that they often smile and cry at the same things.
sent.trans: 这对孪生兄弟的共同情感非常强烈，他们常常对于同一事物要笑就一起笑，要哭就一起哭。

sent.orig: The Ludlow Massacre set off a wave of sympathy for the strikers.
sent.trans: 勒德洛的屠杀激起人们对罢工者同情的浪潮。

sent.orig: It was too dark to see her, and the invisible substance of her sympathy undid him.
sent.trans: 天太暗了，看不清她，而她那看不见的同情更令他不安。

sent.orig: His remorse is just an artifice to gain sympathy.
sent.trans: 他的悔恨只是一种骗局，是为了博取同情。
